RelatedSentence: The faith , courage and determination of the Egyptian Christians is astonishing , as friends and neighbours turned against them to burn them out of their homes and churches .
The Amazing Grace of the title is the grace and the power to forgive their attackers and remain in Egypt to serve the country they love and the people they love .
